head-and-shoulders.context: Saul's physical description - tallest in Israel
head-and-shoulders.english: He was a head taller than any of the people

thousands-tens-thousands.context: The song that sparked Saul's jealousy of David
thousands-tens-thousands.english: Saul has slain his thousands; David, his tens of thousands!

jealous-eye.context: The beginning of Saul's obsession with David
jealous-eye.english: From that day on Saul kept a jealous eye on David

fallen-on-sword.context: Saul's tragic end on Mount Gilboa
fallen-on-sword.english: Saul grasped the sword and fell upon it

only-the-kingship.context: Saul realizes David threatens his throne
only-the-kingship.english: All that he lacks is the kingship!
